2013 Riders, teams and tracks; both simulation and accessible bike handling
with scalable aids; photorealistic graphics with TV style interface; ingame
voice over by official MotoGP commentators; first person elements such as
the helmet view and 3D pits to put you in the rider s shoes. This is MotoGP
13, the official MotoGP videogame: try Career Mode, rising from a Moto3
wildcard to the MotoGP World Champion, or challenge your friends in Split
Screen or Online Championship.


1. Unrar this release into your game install directory, overwriting the
   existing file.
2. Play the game without the image/disc mounted.
3. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!

THIS IS A VIRUS. DON'T USE. If you decompile the EXE, the submitter has injected some malicious code that will steal key strokes.
